author: noriakibrutusbombiba
review: BEST TOASTIES EVER, STAFF WERE REALLY FRIENDLY AND HUMBLE LIKE KING AL AND we got tattoos in the convinience store next to it 10/10 would eat again i love it. my family loved it my name is Noriaki and my family loves it. would be great if they put brown stuff in their food.

author: Lula444
review: Went during lockdown got take away coffee and cake. Staff were so friendly and the coffee was hot. Cake was delicious.

author: jadehY2472TC
review: Owners and staff were really friendly, the coffee was lovely and the food was presented and tasted very nice. Bonus..a small children's area with books and toys.

author: SaraCross45
review: A great gem of a cafe based in Bramley, varied menu, good covid precautions in place, large outside garden

author: 235davef
review: Stopped here for a take away coffee while out walking today. The coffee was really delicious and the welcome was very warm and friendly. Looking forward to going here for breakfast when the lockdown eases.

author: Nos6
review: Only popped in for a quick coffee with my 15 month old but first impressions extremely favourable - and I can see from other reviews that I am not alone. Very friendly staff, decent (aforementioned) coffee and a great albeit relatively small soft carpeted play area to keep little ones occupied. I would say that I’d be going back soon to try some of the other things that they offer however appears on their website that they have closed for the foreseeable future due to the Coronavirus.

author: Foster R
review: Lovely child friendly place with good vegan options. Really friendly kind staff. Nice vibe. Play area for young children

author: Colleen L
review: don’t normally bother to review (especially as I got a take away panini) however I ordered a vegan panini... expecting the usual bland roasted vegetables and houmous. How wrong I was. This was one of the most delicious paninis I’ve ever eaten. Happy to see good vegan options locally at last!!!
